item.title: LA CTF 2024 - pwn/aplet123
item.description: We are given a binary and source code. Taking a look at the source code: #include <stdio.h> #include <stdlib.h> #include <string.h> #include <time.h> #include <unistd.h> void print_flag(void) { char flag[256]; FILE *flag_file = fopen("flag.txt", "r"); fgets(flag, sizeof flag, flag_file); puts(flag); } const char *const responses[] = {"L", "amongus", "true", "pickle", "GINKOID", "L bozo", "wtf", "not with that attitude", "increble", "based", "so true", "monka", "wat", "monkaS", "banned", "holy based", "daz crazy", "smh", "bruh", "lol", "mfw", "skissue", "so relatable", "copium", "untrue!
